title: Hotkeys aren't working
body: I just played a game where I played jinx (This bug happened to other champs as well but I think this bug happens to all champs) and my hotkeys weren't working at all, and basically leaving my team as a 4v5. I tried helping by auto attacking only but it was just feeding. I really hope you guys can take this bug serious because I and many other people who might experience this bug again won't get punished as a feeder or afk. This bug happened 3 times now  to me and I see zero solutions on how to fix it.

replies.body:
Hmmmm it sounds like your hotkeys aren't being downloaded from the servers correctly, or maybe they were saved incorrectly server side which keeps loading incorrect keybindings. Let's give those a hard reset with these steps, and let me know if it doesn't help!

- Log into the game client
- Navigate to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\
- Delete the folder named **Config**
- Go into a practice game and verify that settings have saved properly. 
- Leave game to sync settings
